snippet: The surprising performance of the Puerto Rican team in the World Baseball Classic could provide a much-needed lift for the sport in the commonwealth.
abstract: Puerto Rico surprises the baseball-watching world by defeating Spain and Venezuela in quick succession to secure spot in second round of the World Baseball Classic; success in the Classic could help revive the sport in Puerto Rico.
lead_paragraph: The surprising performance of the Puerto Rican team in the World Baseball Classic could provide a much-needed lift for the sport in the commonwealth.

headline.seo: World Baseball Classic Success Could Inspire Puerto Rico
headline.main: Success in the Classic Could Help Revive Baseball in Puerto Rico
headline.print_headline: Success in the Classic Could Help Revive Baseball in Puerto Rico
